description: An advanced contract award notice (ACAN) is a public notice indicating to the supplier community that a department or agency intends to award a contract for goods, services or construction to a pre-identified supplier, thereby allowing other suppliers to signal their interest in bidding, by submitting a statement of capabilities. If no supplier submits, a statement of capabilities that meet the requirements set out in the ACAN, on or before the closing date and time stated in the ACAN, the contracting officer may then proceed with the award to the pre-identified supplier.
full_summary:
## Elder Helper Services for Correctional Institutions
 Title: Elder Helper Services
 Reference Number: PW-23-01028820
 Solicitation Number: 21301-24-4345407

## Important Details

*   **Closing Date and Time:** 2023-03-17 14:00:00 EDT
*   **Notice Type:** Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)
*   **Procurement Category:** Services
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Limited Tendering
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** Quebec (except NCR)
*   **Regions of Delivery:** Quebec (except NCR)
*   **Contracting Entity Name:** Correctional Service of Canada

## Description of Requirement
The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) requires Elder Helper services to meet the needs of Indigenous offenders and support their reintegration into society. The Elder Helper will work with Indigenous clients to help them develop an understanding of their traditional Indigenous spirituality, while also allowing non-Indigenous clients to practice their beliefs and values systems.

## Key Responsibilities
*   **Elder Programming:** Provide Elder programming to meet the needs of Indigenous offenders, including supporting their traditional healing journey and developing an understanding of traditional Indigenous culture.
*   **Supervision:** Coordinate and provide supervision for offenders during traditional ceremonies and, with the Elder's agreement, perform traditional ceremonies in the absence of the Elder.
*   **Teachings and Counseling:** Conduct group discussions and teachings, with the Elder's agreement, in the identification and proper use of ceremonial objects for offenders and staff.
*   **Report Preparation:** Assist staff to prepare reports (verbal and written) and provide other technical support for case management and parole processes.
*   **Cultural Awareness:** Provide cultural awareness sessions in traditional teachings and healing to Case Management Team members and institutional staff to promote a culturally safe environment for Indigenous offenders.

## Technical Requirements
*   **Language of Work:** Perform all work in French and in English.
*   **Security Requirements:** Hold a valid RELIABILITY STATUS granted or approved by Correctional Services Canada (CSC).
*   **Paper Consumption:** Double-sided printing in black and white format is the default unless otherwise specified by the Project Authority.
*   **Recycling:** Recycle unneeded printed documents.

## Evaluation Criteria
The statement of capabilities must clearly demonstrate how the supplier meets the advertised requirements. Assessors will evaluate the statement based on the following criteria:

*   **Elder Experience:** The supplier must provide their experience as an Elder
